name: MADGUN
description:
MADGUN is a super-fast, old-school first-person shooter. This game combines the gameplay of the old Doom and the dynamism of Quake.






The main character is a commando with the call sign MADGUN. You have to complete a special mission in the monster prison where you have to free... / / { data classified } / /

You have to kill a lot of prison defenders and defeat the bosses guarding the sacred keys to get out of the prison.



Use the entire arsenal of weapons - from a knife to a grenade launcher, to kill ruthless monsters, as well as their bosses.



Collect the maximum number of points and show how professional you are.

Find secret levels and learn more about the world you've entered.
